channel.title: CVE Feed for Ping Identity -- PingID Mobile Application
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Ping Identity -- PingID Mobile Application

item.title: CVE-2021-41994|2024-08-04T03:22:25.662Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20mobile%20application
item.description: A misconfiguration of RSA in PingID iOS app prior to 1.19 is vulnerable to pre-computed dictionary attacks, leading to an offline MFA bypass when using PingID Windows Login.

item.title: CVE-2021-41993|2024-08-04T03:22:25.789Z -- ping%20identity -- pingid%20mobile%20application
item.description: A misconfiguration of RSA in PingID Android app prior to 1.19 is vulnerable to pre-computed dictionary attacks, leading to an offline MFA bypass when using PingID Windows Login.
